item.description:
Welcome to the Providence Collective Monday Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar and restaurant scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: the Red Fez on Peck Street in Providence (Look for the little hat on the sign)

For those of you that know me, you won't be shocked that when I had an opportunity to host a Monday night I picked the Fez. This place has awesome signature summer cocktails and exceptional food at a reasonable price. I hope you join us for what will be a great time.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the loud group upstairs!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup- Red Fez!
